= Prereq =

{{{bash
gpg --full-gen-key
}}}
>From there, you can just enter the default options 

There will be a prompt for your email. This is ONLY used as an *identifier*.


Now, you may run:
{{{bash
pass init $EMAIL
}}}


= Creating Passwords =

{{{bash
pass add <CATEGORY>
}}}
>Where category is the identifier for the password like "School Email" or something


= Neat Commands =

{{{bash
pass ls
}}}
>Will list all of your passwords


{{{bash
passmenu
}}}
>Dmenu browse your passwords
